channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Paramount renews bid for Warner Bros, ensuring $40B Larry Ellison backing
item.description: It's the latest attempt by one major Hollywood superpower to acquire another.

item.title: CEO of SpaceX rival United Launch Alliance resigns
item.description: Tory Bruno's abrupt departure comes after 12 years in the role. The company, a Boeing-Lockheed Martin joint venture, has had to fight to keep pace wit...

item.title: Trump admin halts 6 GW of offshore wind leases again
item.description: The move is the latest attempt by the Trump administration to delay the construction of 6 gigawatts of offshore wind near a hotspot of data center dev...

item.title: A comprehensive list of 2025 tech layoffs
item.description: A complete list of all the known layoffs in tech, from Big Tech to startups, broken down by month throughout 2025.

item.title: The Doomsday Glacier Is Getting Closer and Closer to Irreversible Collapse
item.description: An analysis of the expansion of cracks in the Thwaites Glacier over the past 20 years suggests that a total collapse could be only a matter of time.

item.title: Elevate your home bar with these mixology gadgets
item.description: From robotic bartenders to smart coasters that ensure the perfect pour, here are some cool gadgets to elevate your home bar.

item.title: ChatGPT: Everything you need to know about the AI-powered chatbot
item.description: A timeline of ChatGPT product updates and releases, starting with the latest, which weâ€™ve been updating throughout the year.

item.title: ChatGPT launches a year-end review like Spotify Wrapped
item.description: The experience includes awards, poems, and pictures referencing your year in chat.

item.title: Grado Signature S750 Review: Insane Sound, Old-School Fit
item.description: These open-back headphones sound insane, but they aren't that comfortable.

item.title: TikTok Shop launches digital gift cards to challenge Amazon and eBay
